product.description: With elements of both a road bike and mountain bike, the Ariel is for the female rider looking to zip through the weekday commute and head out for weekend adventure. The Ariel Sport Disc features a A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's Fitness Geometry, Tektro Draco hydraulic disc brake, and a 75mm-travel SR Suntour fork for a plush ride.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's Fitness Geometry and tubesets for a lightweight and confidence-inspiring ride. Fender/rack braze-ons for versatility
SR Suntour 60mm-travel custom women's coil sprung fork with lockout and alloy lowers provides a capable and plush ride
SR Suntour 9-speed triple crankset and 11-32 cassette gives you all the gears you need for varied terrain, plus Shimano Acera rear derailleur for crisp and reliable shifting
Tektro Draco hydraulic disc brakes with dual pistons and women's shorter reach levers assure precision braking and fit
Women's Body Geometry Riva saddle features a women's cutout and plush seating area for all-day riding comfort

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized A1 Premium Aluminium, Women's Fitness Geometry and tubesets, double-butted, w/ fender/rack braze-ons, forged dropouts, kickstand mount
specs.fork: FORK SR Suntour NEXi Coil, custom women's coil spring, aluminium lower, custom integrated crown, mechanical lockout, 60mm travel
specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" FSA Ahead, semi-integrated, 8mm cone spacer
specs.handlebars: HANDLEBARS Specialized XC riser bar, alloy, 8-degree backsweep, 25mm rise, 25.4mm
specs.grips: GRIPS Specialized Body Geometry Women's XCT, lock-on
specs.front_brake: FRONT BRAKE Tektro Draco, hydraulic disc, dual piston, 160mm rotor
specs.rear_brake: REAR BRAKE Tektro Draco, hydraulic disc, dual piston, 160mm rotor
specs.brake_levers: BRAKE LEVERS Tektro Draco, hydraulic lever, women's shorter reach
specs.front_derailleur: FRONT DERAILLEUR Shimano FDM-390, top-swing, dual-pull
specs.crankset: CRANKSET SR Suntour XCR, 9-speed, square spindle, w/ chainguard
specs.bottom_bracket: BOTTOM BRACKET Cartridge bearings, square spindle, capless bolts
specs.pedals: PEDALS Composite plastic body, loose ball, w/ reflectors
specs.rims: RIMS Disc, alloy double-wall, pin joint, 32h
specs.front_hub: FRONT HUB Disc, double-sealed, ground race, dual-lock nuts w/ 17mm contact side, 5mm QR, round disc mount
specs.rear_hub: REAR HUB Disc, double-sealed, ground race, loose ball, dual-lock nuts w/ 19mm contact side, QR, 32h
specs.front_tire: FRONT TYRE Specialized Trigger Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, 700x38c
specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Trigger Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, 700x38c
specs.saddle: SADDLE Specialized Body Geometry Riva Women's, steel rails, 155mm
specs.seat_binder: SEAT BINDER Alloy, 31.8mm, QR, nylon washer

geo_heading.geo_size: Size XS S M L XL

product.description: With elements of both a road bike and mountain bike, the Ariel is for the female rider looking to zip through the weekday commute and head out for weekend adventure. The Ariel Disc features a A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's Fitness Geometry, Tektro Novela disc brakes, and a 60mm-travel SR Suntour fork for a plush ride.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's Fitness Geometry and tubesets for a lightweight and confidence-inspiring ride. Fender/rack braze-ons for versatility
SR Suntour 60mm-travel custom women's coil sprung fork with lockout and alloy lowers provides a capable and plush ride
SR Suntour 8-speed triple crankset gives you all the gears you need for varied terrain, with a chainguard for added protection
Tektro Novela mechanical disc brakes for solid braking and easy maintenance under any conditions
Women's Body Geometry Riva saddle features a women's cutout and plush seating area for all-day riding comfort

The Ariel Step-Through features a A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's Fitness Geometry, Body Geometry Women's Riva saddle, and a 60mm-travel SR Suntour fork for a plush ride.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium step-through frame with Women's Fitness Geometry and tubesets for a lightweight and confidence-inspiring ride. Fender/rack braze-ons for versatility

Women's Body Geometry Riva saddle features a women's cutout and plush seating area for all-day riding comfort
